attributes.action: ask the Queen to dissolve Parliament and to call a general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many reasons why we might wish to be given an opportunity to exercise our democratic right to elect a Member of Parliament. This petition is designed simply and without prejudice to provide a way for all of us to express our desire for a general election, without creating multiple similar petitions for different reasons.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
